message: I think we can both get a better deal if we work together. I'm willing to take a slightly smaller share, but I need to be sure we both walk away with something substantial.
I can go a bit lower, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Let's be reasonable. This is getting ridiculous. We both need to compromise to get anything at all.
I see you're willing to meet in the middle, but I still think I can get a bit more.
I'm starting to think we're not going to be able to agree. Let's make this the last offer, or we'll both walk away with nothing.
